mapper.update: update product_category set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pid, sort, title, status, create_time, create_name, update_time, update_name from product_category
